lede: Key statistics here are on the value and percentage of business sales that take place over the internet. We also measure the percentage of businesses that have a website and a broadband connection. These figures allow us to monitor the growing importance of the internet to UK businesses.

bulletins.summary: This release provides estimates of the values of e-commerce and the adoption and use of Information and Communication Technologies (ICTs) by UK businesses. The source of the information is the E-commerce Survey of UK Businesses.
bulletins.name: E-Commerce and ICT Activity, 2012
